content.text: How to make a Lexer from scratch
In this guide you are going to learn how to make a lexer for your programming language.
.1 First we need to define our tokens (iâ€™m going to make only a simple lexer)

class TokenType:

    # Keywords
    
    VAR = 0
    WHILE = 1
    CALL = 2
    TO = 3
    IF = 4
    ELSE = 5
    ELIF = 6
    FUNC = 7
    FOR = 8
    RETURN = 9
    AND = 26
    OR = 27
    XOR = 28 # XOR BETWEEN TRUE OR FALSE
    
    # SYMBOLS
    
    PLUS = 10
    STAR = 11
    SLASH = 12
    EQUAL = 13
    EQUAL_EQUAL = 14
    BANG = 15
    BANG_EQUAL = 16
    MINUS = 17
    STAR_EQUAL = 18
    SLASH_EQUAL = 19
    MINUS_EQUAL = 20
    PLUS_EQUAL = 21
    LESS = 22
    GREATER = 23
    LESS_EQUAL = 24
    GREATER_EQUAL = 25
    HASH = 29
    COMMA = 32
    SEMICOLON = 33
    LPAREN = 34
    RPAREN = 35
    LBRACE = 36
    RBRACE = 37
    DOT = 38
    DOT_DOT = 39 # :
    
    # BUILTIN
    
    PRINT = 40
    INPUT = 41
    IMPORT = 42
    
    # OTHER
    
    IDENTIFIER = 30
    EOF = 31
